metadata.title: Between a Ball and a Hot Place

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This episode is sponsored by Ravensburger and their brand new title "Pusheen Purrfect Pick"! An adorable game about--
